title.rendered: Women Can Discover Their Next Chapter At The Life After 50: How to Reinvent Yourself Symposium

content.rendered:
Women 50 and above are invited to attend this transformative event to learn how to reinvent themselves. Register now!

Master Life Coach Sarita Robertson Price created this event after finding it necessary to reinvent herself after 50.

Radio Talk Show Host, Book Author and Founder of Soul Wealth Academy Vikki Johnson is the keynote speaker of the Life After 50: How to Reinvent Yourself Symposium

Women ages 50 and over can gain the insight and tools to live the life they always wanted at the Life After 50: How to Reinvent Yourself Symposium On May 4th.

Many women, when they approach 50 believe it’s time to prepare for retirement. I disagree. Our advanced years often offer the perfect opportunity to reinvent ourselves and start something new.”

— Sarita Robertson Price, Master Life Coach

MEMPHIS, TN, UNITED STATES, March 26, 2024 /EINPresswire.com/ — The Life After 50: How to Reinvent Yourself Symposium is Saturday, May 4th in Memphis, TN. Female Baby Boomers and Gen Xers ages 50 and beyond who believe it’s time for a change in their career, education, health, and/or hobbies are invited to attend and learn strategies for creating a life that brings joy, peace, and accomplishment. Renowned Life Strategist, Washington, DC Radio Talk Show Host, and Founder of Soul Wealth Academy Dr. Vikki Johnson, will grace the stage as the keynote speaker and share a wealth of knowledge and inspiration to help attendees unlock their full potential. The event is 10 a.m. – 1:30 p.m. at Opulence Ballroom, located at 4651 American Way. Tickets can be purchased at www.fspenterprises.net.

This transformative event was founded by Board-Certified Master Life, Leadership, and Career Coach Sarita Robertson Price. Through her company, FSP Enterprises, she assists individuals in developing and enhancing their professional skills to equip themselves to live and lead with confidence and boldness. “Many women, when they approach 50 believe it’s time to prepare for retirement. I disagree. Our advanced years often offer the perfect opportunity to reinvent ourselves and start something new,” said Price. “We often have more free time and resources at our disposal. Why not use this stage of life to pursue your passions and dreams? This symposium will encourage women to embrace change, make goals, and seize the opportunities that come with it!”

The Life After 50: How to Reinvent Yourself Symposium also features a panel of phenomenal women who will address topics such as career development, entrepreneurship, education, technology (AI), mental health and wellbeing, becoming an author, and more. Our panel of professionals is comprised of:
Beverly Anderson, Entrepreneur Training Institute
Celeste Jona Gay, Professional Actress
Dr. Denise Lofton, The Doc Shop (Management Consultant)
Tisch McDaniel, M&M Advisory Group, Inc.
Janice Williams, JOW Consulting
Tamatha Borkcom, ASAP Counseling & Services, PLLC

Join the Life After 50: How to Reinvent Yourself Symposium to embark on a journey of self-discovery, growth, and transformation. For more information and to purchase tickets, visit www.fspenterprises.net

Jae Henderson
Put It In Writing PR
+1 901-359-6629
email us here

Facebook
